body:
Hi Ashish,

It appears that E+ does not like spaces in the file path names, you epw file must therefore be located in a sequence of fodlers that do not have spaces:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/no-weather-...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/no-weather-file-attached-issue-in-honeybee-e?xg_source=activity)

Nicolas
